data.1: I CALL TO witness the sky (bespangled) with the signs of the Zodiac,
data.3: And the witness and the witnessed,
data.4: That accursed are the men of the trench
data.5: Full of fire fed by faggots,
data.7: Witnessing what they had done to the believers!
data.8: They had no other reason for hating them except that they believed in God the mighty, worthy of praise,
data.9: Whose kingdom spreads over the heavens and the earth. God is witness over everything.
data.10: Surely for those who persecute believers, men and women, and do not repent afterwards, is the punishment of Hell, and the punishment of burning.
data.11: Surely for those who believe and do the right are gardens with rivers running by. That is the greatest success.
data.12: The grip of your Lord is severe indeed!
data.13: It is verily He who initiates and repeats.
data.14: He is the forgiving and the loving,
data.15: The Lord of the glorious Throne,
data.17: Has the story of the hordes
data.18: Of Pharaoh and Thamud come to you?
data.19: Yet the infidels persist in denial.
data.20: But God surrounds them from all sides.
data.21: This is indeed the glorious Qur´an
